name: Gaia Online - Layout System Simplifier (Firefox)
description: [Firefox] Gaia Online - New customization to simplifies the use of the Layout System with some slight modification, and bugs fixed. Including a new rich appearance for the window theme. (Look at the info if you are using Google Chrome)
additional_info:
Version 1.0 (Beta) for Firefox
Not using Firefox ? Click here » http://userstyles.org/styles/55074/gaia-online-layout-system-simplifier-chrome?r=1318968889 « to obtain the version for Google Chrome.

Visible effects in editor mode except for Gaia navigator.

● The theme window has a better appearance

● Gaia navigator scrolls with the page

● Control panel scrolls with the page

● The contents of the theme have a better shape

● Multiple issue from the developers of Gaia corrected
